summary: This is an email forwarding a court unsealing order related to the Epstein case. It shows communication between legal parties regarding the release of documents, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in July 2020.

persons.name: Katharine Parker
persons.role: Sender of email with unsealing order
persons.context: Sent an email containing the unsealing order from a U.S. courts government domain to recipients regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Unsealing order communication
events.description: Katharine Parker sends an email forwarding a government unsealing request and proposed order related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An unsealing order was being processed in the Epstein case on July 2, 2020.
The document shows legal communication regarding government requests to unseal case materials.
The email originated from a U.S. courts government domain (us courts.gov).
